BeyondSlimes.Sisco++.name: BeyondSlimes
BeyondSlimes.Sisco++.author: Sisco++
BeyondSlimes.Sisco++.description:
- Increases VacPak firing speed.
- Increases VacPak suction strength.
- Increases the force of the vac-pak's pulse-wave.
- Allows slimes to be sold.
- Reduces value of all plorts.
- Increases damage dealt by slimes.
- Reduces the amount of food that spawns(everywhere) and increases respawn time for said food.
